titleStmt.title: Technogamia: or The marriages of the arts A comedie, written by Barten Holyday, Master of Arts, and student of Christ-Church in Oxford, and acted by the students of the same house before the Vniuersitie, at Shroue-tide.
titleStmt.author: Holyday, Barten, 1593-1661.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Stansby for Iohn Parker, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the Ball,

notesStmt.note: First word of title in Greek characters.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the Ball
